Song.title: Great One In Three
Song.copyright: Â© 2015 Sovereign Grace Worship Music & Words by George Romanacce and Steve & Vikki Cook

Arrangement.text:
INTRO: [3/4 F Gm | Dm | Dm F/C | Bb (repeat)]
VERSE 1: [F]Come now, Al[Gm]mighty [Dm]King, [Dm]rule and reign [Bb]over [F]us [F]Help us Your [Gm]praise to [Dm]sing, [2/4] [Dm]Father [Bb]glo[4/4]ri[F]ous [3/4]Em[Bb]bracing us be[C]fore all [Dm]time You [Gm]made us heirs with [F/A]Christ on [Bb]high [F]By Your Spirit n[Gm]ow we [Dm]cry, [2/4] [Dm]"Abba [Bb]Fa[4/4 F]ther"
CHORUS: We [C]long for the [Dm]day, Great [Bb]One in [F]Three We [C]finally be[Dm]hold Your [Bb]majes[F]ty [C]Face to [Dm]face, we'll [Bb]worship and a[Dm]dore For[Csus]ev[C]er[3/4][F]more [(intro)]
VERSE 2: [F]Speak now, In[Gm]carnate [Dm]Word, [Dm]of Your re[Bb]lentless [F]love [F]Bearing our [Gm]fatal [Dm]curse{,} [2/4] [Dm]with Your [Bb]living [4/4][F]blood [3/4]When [Bb]guilt and doubt come [C]rushing [Dm]in [Gm]Help us see Your [F/A]cross a[Bb]gain [F]You're the Rock on [Gm]which we [Dm]live, [2/4][Dm]Jesus, [Bb]Sav[4/4][F]ior
VERSE 3: [F]Come, Holy [Gm]Comfor[Dm]ter, [Dm]give grace to [Bb]weary [F]hearts [F]Bring back the [Gm]wande[Dm]rer, [2/4][Dm]drive a[Bb]way [4/4]the [F]dark [3/4][Bb]You're the summer [C]of our [Dm]souls [Gm]You're the fountain [F/A]of our [Bb]hope [F]Our assurance [Gm]here b[Dm]elow, [2/4][Dm]Spirit [Bb]of [4/4]the [F]Son
Arrangement.searchtext: intro verse 1 come now almighty king rule and reign over us help us your praise to sing father glorious embracing us before all time you made us heirs with christ on high by your spirit now we cry abba father chorus we long for the day great one in three we finally behold your majesty face to face well worship and adore forevermore verse 2 speak now incarnate word of your relentless love bearing our fatal curse with your living blood when guilt and doubt come rushing in help us see your cross again youre the rock on which we live jesus savior verse 3 come holy comforter give grace to weary hearts bring back the wanderer drive away the dark youre the summer of our souls youre the fountain of our hope our assurance here below spirit of the son
